    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    generateTypeMonthTotal()
    This method generates/displays the total number of appointments based on type and/or month selected.
    void
    generateUserTotal()
    This method generates/displays the total number of appointments scheduled by the selected user in the selected month.
    void
    initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    This method sets up the Reports screen to be populated with all the expected values (specifically the user, customer, type, and month combo box values).
    void
    onBackClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method redirects the user to the Appointments screen on click of the Back button.
    void
    populateCustomerAppointmentTable()
    This method populates the Reports Appointment table based on the Customer selected.

    • onBackClick

      public void onBackClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method redirects the user to the Appointments screen on click of the Back button.
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • populateCustomerAppointmentTable

      public void populateCustomerAppointmentTable() throws SQLException
      This method populates the Reports Appointment table based on the Customer selected. The start and end date are only displayed as Strings using lambda expressions for formatting purposes, the objects themselves use LocalDateTime and are stored as such.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • generateTypeMonthTotal

      public void generateTypeMonthTotal() throws SQLException
      This method generates/displays the total number of appointments based on type and/or month selected.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • generateUserTotal

      public void generateUserTotal() throws SQLException
      This method generates/displays the total number of appointments scheduled by the selected user in the selected month.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
